Key Match Events: India beat Zimbabwe by 23 runs in third T20I
Khaleel Ahmed got rid of Tadiwanashe Marumani
Brian Bennett was sent on his way back to the pavilion courtesy of a sensational catch by Ravi Bishnoi
Sikandar Raza (15 off 16) holed out to deep mid-wicket against Washington Sundar (3/15, four overs)
Dion Myers continued to play his shots and brought up his maiden T20I fifty (65* off 49)
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will look to seal the series in the fourth game on Saturday, July 13 at the same venue
Others: Blessing Muzarabani (2/25) and Sikandar Raza (2/24) took two wickets each for Zimbabwe
